front.title: •Dr. Evazan's Sawed-off Blaster
front.gametext: Deploy on Dr. Evazan (may deploy on him as a 'react') or use 3 Force to deploy on your warrior. May target a character or creature at same or adjacent site using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value. May fire repeatedly.
front.lore: Equipped with powerful infrared scope. Extremely sensitive trigger mechanism. Used to earn Evazan the death sentence on several systems.

canceledBy: Game text canceled by Mandalorian Mishap
